name: Cacaua Goat
description: These gentle beasts can be found all over Teyvat and were among the earliest livestock tamed by humans.\nContrary to what the name might suggest, Cacaua Goats do not give off a uniquely bitter odor. This unforgettable name originates from the hue of their wool, which closely resembles that of food and drink made from Cacahuatl.\nSince arriving in The Realm Within, Cacaua Goats have become popular among small birds who like to nest within their soft wool. After all, wool of such a pure chocolatey color is a rare sight in nature...
